name: Who Is This Man
description: Who is This Man is an spy game with privacy and hiding. Secretly infiltrate his target's house and miss his stuff. Report them later.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better Storage: 2200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 970/Radeon RX470 or better Storage: 3 GB available space
